headline: Is Omnicom Group (OMC) Pricing Reflect Recent Agency Model Shifts Accurately
summary: If you are wondering whether Omnicom Group’s current share price reflects its true worth, you are not alone. This article is all about breaking that question down in a practical way. The stock recently closed at US$78.58, with returns of a 2.0% decline over 7 days, a 1.3% decline over 30 days, a 3.4% decline year to date and a 5.3% decline over the last year, while the 5 year return sits at 40.6%. Recent headlines around Omnicom Group have focused on how large advertising groups are...
